pages.speaker: brendan
lines: So it's all over...

lines.expression: ' ' + q.player.username + ', we owe you great thanks.';

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Look above you.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: The sky over Sootopolis has returned to normal.

pages.speaker: archie
lines: Somehow, it's...so warm...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Is the energy that had been amassed deep within the Cave of Origin now flowing out to pour over the greater world?

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: It's as if the uncertainty and fear from moments ago never even existed.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: My heart feels like it's been softly set at ease...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: ... The sea or the land...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: Pokémon or humanity...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: All this time we've just been trying to grab onto happiness for one of them, even if it meant destroying the other...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: Look at how things have turned out, now the world's got its natural balance back...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: We've got to rethink this thing from the very start...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: We've got to redo everything we've done from scratch—and get it right this time.

pages.speaker: archie
lines: Whaddaya say? Maxie...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: ... I suppose...you may be right...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: However... Personally, in my case...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Some wrongs cannot be atoned for, no matter how you try to right them.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: And I have committed wrongs so great as to bring the whole world to its knees. It may be that I...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: It may be too much to assume that I should deserve the chance to start anything over.

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Leader...

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Without a doubt, you have committed an offense that can never be forgiven.

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: You have wronged not only Team Magma but all living things on this planet, whether great or small.

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: However, that is precisely why you must now set things right.

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: You must continue to atone for the sins you have committed, even at the risk of your own life...

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: To set right the wrongs you've done, without running away in fear— isn't that how an adult accepts responsibility?

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: ... Should you find the resolve to do so inside yourself, then I...

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: Team Magma Admin Tabitha...

pages.speaker: tabitha
lines: I will serve at your side as counsel forever.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: T-Tabitha...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: ... Thank you.

pages.speaker: archie
lines: Y'know...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: Someday we adults are gonna have to hand this world off to this little scamp and the rest of your generation.

pages.speaker: archie
lines: But what kinda world are we adults gonna make?

pages.speaker: archie
lines: What kinda world do we wanna pass to these kids?

pages.speaker: archie
lines: If we haven't even figured that out ourselves, we're never gonna get anywhere.

pages.speaker: archie
lines: So are we gonna make a world where everyone can coexist together?

pages.speaker: archie
lines: Or, after all, is it gonna be a world that we claim by force? One that we fight and scrabble over...

pages.speaker: archie
lines: I don't know, but I think we can at least start by giving it some time and thinking it over.

pages.speaker: archie
lines: All of us can do that, whether we're Team Aqua or Team Magma or whatever...

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: You were able to use that Blue Orb to great effect, so I imagine you will also be able to handle this.

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Have Groudon hold it, and you should be able to control its Primal Reversion for at least a short period, such as during a battle.

pages.speaker: player
lines: You obtained a Red Orb!

pages.speaker: archie
lines: And that's it from me! Later, scamp!

pages.speaker: maxie
lines: Farewell.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Team Magma and Team Aqua are made up of people with completely opposing ideals and goals.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: But perhaps even they can learn to meet halfway...one small concession at a time.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I know it's too much to expect that everything will change at once, but...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I hope this crisis might at least help them take that first vital step forward.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I imagine that many changes are happening now all across Hoenn.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I hope you will be able to travel this world and see its richness with your own eyes—

pages.speaker: steven
lines: and revel in its newness in your own heart.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: But for the present, you may first wish to challenge this city's Pokémon Gym.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: There, you'll find the very same Wallace who helped us so much waiting for you.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: He's strong.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: But the way you are now, you should be capable of battling him on an equal footing.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: And when you travel the world, you should try to use this.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: This flute is one of my favorite items.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:spawn/eon_flute');

pages.speaker: player
lines: You obtained the Eon Flute!

pages.speaker: steven
lines: This Eon Flute is proof of the bond between you and your Latios.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: No matter how far you may be from one another, play that flute and Latios will surely fly straight to you.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Then it can take to the sky, soaring above the land with you astride its back.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Yes, just like when we first encountered Latias and Latios at Southern Island...

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode spectator');

pages.speaker: steven
lines: People, Pokémon, nature itself...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Our survival in this world depends on all of us living together in harmony.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I feel I have just begun to understand that.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: And I'm wondering how the world will continue to change from this point on...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: It fills me with an inexplicable excitement.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run gamemode adventure');

pages.speaker: steven
lines: As you and your Pokémon live and grow in this changed world, I wonder what effect it will have on you.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: What will you think about? What ideals will you believe in?

pages.speaker: steven
lines: If we do get the chance to meet again, I hope you will be able to show me and my team the answers you've found.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Until then.

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: Phew! It feels like we can finally relax, huh?

lines.expression: 'I guess that now\'s the time to say thanks for all you\'ve done, ' + q.player.username + '.';

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: You know, we set out from Littleroot at the same time, but...

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: It seems like you're just dashing ahead by yourself and leaving me behind...

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: I feel like we're not even on the same level anymore, you know?

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: ... It's kinda lonely thinking like that...

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: Or it would be if I really thought that!

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: But...well, you did do something pretty amazing. So take it easy for a while, OK, friend?

pages.speaker: brendan
lines: Later!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={GameVersion=1}] run advancement grant @s only hoenn:story_magma/groudon2');
